title: Uncle Si Will Never Forget These Childhood Shenanigans
description:
Si tells the most hilarious, mischievous, and painful stories from the childhood games he played with his brothers. The boys wonder if the Robertson boys were being tough or just dumb. Martin calls out Phillip for being sneaky good at pool, and Si talks about finishing a game using a mop handle for a pool cue. Phillip bets John-David that he can rip a phonebook in half. Challenge accepted! Si talks about his Uncle Marvin’s unusual health problem that came from eating lots of ducks. And the boys answer questions about tattoos, celebrity pastors, and grown men playing video games.
-
